long_description: Like to travel? So does this skirt. Pack along the Isis Portofino Skirt and be ready for adventures abroad! Flattering A-line style; high-stretch fabric moves with you. Easy-care fabric packs well, resists wrinkles and offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. The Isis Portofino skirt features a hidden waistband pocket to keep essentials close. Rise sits below the waist, just at your belly button; slightly higher rise in back. Closeout.
short_description: Like to travel? So does this skirt. Pack along the Isis Portofino Skirt and be ready for adventures abroad!
